name: Block
rules:
When you are targeted for damage, no damage is taken.
The number of available activations is {count}.

name: Counter
rules:
When you are targeted for damage, the player targeting you is dealt {count} damage after the resolution of their card. 
Can not be used in response to another Counter.

name: Endure
rules:
If your card would be defeated, their HP is reduced to 1 instead. 
The number of available activations is {count}.

name: Redirect
rules:
When you are targeted for damage, an adjacent foe other than the targeting player becomes the new target. 
The number of available activations is {count}.
Can not be used in response to another Redirect.
